verses.verse: מִזְמ֡וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm שִׁיר־ <WH7892> [and] Song חֲנֻכַּ֖ת <WH2598> [at] the dedication הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> of the house לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ <WH7311> I will extol יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> thee O LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for דִלִּיתָ֑נִי <WH1802> for thou hast lifted me up וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not שִׂמַּ֖חְתָּ <WH8055> to rejoice אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> and hast not made my foes לִֽי׃
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> my God שִׁוַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7768> I cried אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH413> and וַתִּרְפָּאֵֽנִי׃ <WH7495> unto thee and thou hast healed

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD הֶֽעֱלִ֣יתָ <WH5927> thou hast brought up מִן־ <WH4480> from שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> from the grave נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul חִ֝יִּיתַ֗נִי <WH2421> thou hast kept me alive [מִיֹּורְדֵי־ כ] (מִיָּֽרְדִי־ <WH3381> go בֽוֹר׃ <WH3381> go ק)

זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD חֲסִידָ֑יו <WH2623> O ye saints וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <WH3034> of his and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> of his holiness

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for רֶ֨גַע ׀ <WH7281> [endureth but] a moment בְּאַפּוֹ֮ <WH639> For his anger חַיִּ֪ים <WH2416> [is] life בִּרְצ֫וֹנ֥וֹ <WH7522> in his favour בָּ֭עֶרֶב <WH6153> for a night יָלִ֥ין <WH3885> may endure בֶּ֗כִי <WH1065> weeping וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> [cometh] in the morning רִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> but joy
וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> I אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> I said בְשַׁלְוִ֑י <WH7959> And in my prosperity בַּל־ <WH1077> lest אֶמּ֥וֹט <WH4131> be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> I shall never

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> LORD בִּרְצוֹנְךָ֮ <WH7522> by thy favour הֶעֱמַ֪דְתָּה <WH5975> to stand לְֽהַרְרִ֫י <WH2042> thou hast made my mountain עֹ֥ז <WH5797> strong הִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ <WH5641> thou didst hide פָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> thy face הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> become נִבְהָֽל׃ <WH926> [and] I was troubled
אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> to you יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to thee O LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> I cried וְאֶל־ <WH413> about אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> the Lord אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <WH2603> I made supplication

מַה־ <WH4100> What בֶּ֥צַע <WH1215> What profit בְּדָמִי֮ <WH1818> [is there] in my blood בְּרִדְתִּ֪י <WH3381> when I go down אֶ֫ל־ <WH413> about שָׁ֥חַת <WH7845> corruption הֲיוֹדְךָ֥ <WH3034> praise עָפָ֑ר <WH6083> ashes הֲיַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> thee? shall it declare אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> assured
שְׁמַע־ <WH8085> Hear יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <WH2603> and have mercy יְ֝הוָה <WH3068> upon me LORD הֱ‍ֽיֵה־ <WH1961> become עֹזֵ֥ר <WH5826> be thou my helper לִֽי׃

הָפַ֣כְתָּ <WH2015> Thou hast turned מִסְפְּדִי֮ <WH4553> for me my mourning לְמָח֪וֹל <WH4234> into dancing לִ֥י פִּתַּ֥חְתָּ <WH6605> thou hast put off שַׂקִּ֑י <WH8242> my sackcloth וַֽתְּאַזְּרֵ֥נִי <WH247> and girded שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> me with gladness

לְמַ֤עַן ׀ <WH4616> because of יְזַמֶּרְךָ֣ <WH2167> may sing כָ֭בוֹד <WH3519> To the end that [my] glory וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִדֹּ֑ם <WH1826> praise to thee and not be silent יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> my God לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> unto thee for ever אוֹדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH3034> I will give thanks
